replies.msg:
Dear MyGovHK user,

iAM Smart, Safe and Swift!

The one-stop personalised digital services platform "iAM Smart" has been launched. The public can log in and use more than 20 common government and public utilities online services with a single digital identity through the "iAM Smart" mobile app.

"iAM Smart" provides four major functions, namely authentication, "e-ME" form-filling, personalised notifications and digital signing functions.

Once MyGovHK users register as "iAM Smart" users, they can easily log in online services using biometric authentication. Needless to remember account names and passwords. In addition, "iAM Smart" users can receive personalised notifications by their mobile phones, such as messages from demands for rates and/or Government rent account and Registration of Outbound Travel Information, so that users can keep up with service updates, expiry alerts and latest information. For details, please refer to "iAM Smart" website (www.iamsmart.gov.hk).

Please download the "iAM Smart" mobile app now to enjoy the brand new service experience.
